title: Yawara! Sore Yuke Koshinuke Kid!!
alternative_title: YAWARA！ それゆけ腰ぬけキッズ！！
description: Yawara helps a group of timid grade school kids overcome their fears and compete in a judo competition. One of the kids is Hanazono's cousin, which is how she meets them. Another is a girl who seems a whole lot like Yawara.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Martial Arts>, <Genre -> Romance>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>, <Genre -> Sports>]
